item.name: Add Devices to Device Group (STATIC ONLY)
Remove Devices from Device Group (STATIC ONLY)

variable.description: The ID of the user that will become the owner of the device. Provide a 0 as value to remove the current owner from the device
The UDID of the device to clear the activation lock

query.description: Optional: Filter by Group ID with Comma (1,4,54)
Optional: Filter by userGroup ID with Comma (1,5,8)
Optional: Filter by type of enrollment. Options are: manual, depPending, ac2Pending, dep and ac2

When set to true, it clears all installation failures such that apps get reinstalled when failed previously.

Default value: false

formdata.description: optional - Bool, default False - When set to true, it clears all installation failures such that apps get reinstalled when failed previously.

query.description: true or false to indicate if the passcode should be cleared first

formdata.description: optional - Bool, default False - When set to true, it clears all installation failures such that apps get reinstalled when failed previously.

query.description: true of false to indicate if the activation lock should be cleared first
Token obtained by the POST teacher/authenticate call

variable.description: UDID of device (if no device is given it will remove it all for that media)

body.raw:
{
    "applock": "com.apple.mobilesafari, com.jamf.student",
    "materials": {
        "sites": { "title": "Jamf", "URL" : "jamf.com"},
        "weblock": true,
        "lockInSafari": false
    }
    "allowCamera": true,
    "allowAppstore": false,
    "allowChat": false,
    "allowGamecenter": false,
    "allowNotifications": true,
    "allowSafari": true,
    "allowScreenshots": true,
    "allowSpellcheck": true,
    "allowiTunes": false,
    "genres": "games,entertainment,social",
}

{
    "students": "549, 58, 23",
    "allowCamera": true,
    "allowAppstore": false,
    "allowChat": false,
    "allowGamecenter": false,
    "allowNotifications": true,
    "allowSafari": true,
    "allowScreenshots": true,
    "allowSpellcheck": true,
    "allowiTunes": false,
    "genres": "games,entertainment,social",
    "clearAfter": 60
}

query.description: Filter by group Id with comma (1,5,34)
